mcq.statement: Select the correctly completed sentence: "In the fine print at the end of the document, ______".

options.a: Lies the clauses that make us liable for any expenses that result from civil unrest
options.b: Lies the clauses which make us liable for any expenses that result from civil unrest
options.c: Lie the clauses that make us liable for any expenses that result from civil unrest
options.d: Lies the clauses that make us liable for any expenses which result from civil unrest
